geoRegion: Newcastle Upon Tyne, England, United Kingdom

currentPositions.description:
Working as part of a Global Talent Acquisition team I lead and drive the activity and success of the Talent Acquisition function across our UK sites.

Sterling Pharma Solutions is a global contract development and manufacturing organisation (CDMO) with more than 50 years experience in developing and manufacturing Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs).  This is complemented by Anti Drug Conjugate (ADC) R&D bioconjugation services.

We are a fast growing, dynamic business with facilities in the UK, US and Europe, where we employ more than 1300 talented and passionate people who support our customers in bringing new medicines to market, improving and saving the lives of patients.

If you would like to know more about opportunities within Sterling please click on the link below to access our careers page:

https://www.sterlingpharmasolutions.com/careers/our-vacancies/
currentPositions.title: Talent Acquisition Manager - UK

headline: Talent Acquisition Manager at Sterling Pharma Solutions
location: Newcastle Upon Tyne, England, United Kingdom

message.text:
Vacancy: QA Officer

Location: Cramlington, Northumberland

Working as part of our onsite Quality team, the main purpose of your role will be to perform batch sentencing activities on a named set of products and all quality assurance activities including reviews and approvals etc. relating to those products, working in accordance with current Good Manufacturing Practice (cGMP) and regulatory standards.

We are a fast-growing global pharmaceutical CDMO (Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation), with more than 50 years’ experience in developing and manufacturing Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs). We are a proven and trusted partner to some of the world’s most innovative biotechs and leading pharmaceutical companies and are widely recognised for our expertise in complex and hazardous chemistry.

Please click on the link to find out more....
https://lnkd.in/exA-cNc9
Sterling Pharma Solutions
Karen Gallon
Donna Anderson
Ian Lisle

Vacancy: Senior QA Officer

Location: Cramlington, Northumberland

Working as part of our onsite Quality team, the main purpose of your role will be to perform batch sentencing activities on a named set of products and all quality assurance activities (reviews/approvals/audits etc) relating to those products and specific plant/business areas. You will maintain operational quality systems covering specific areas of expertise, working in accordance with cGMP and regulatory standards.

We are a fast-growing global pharmaceutical CDMO (Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation), with more than 50 years’ experience in developing and manufacturing Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs). We are a proven and trusted partner to some of the world’s most innovative biotechs and leading pharmaceutical companies and are widely recognised for our expertise in complex and hazardous chemistry.

Please click on the link to find out more...
https://lnkd.in/eRPe-SDU
Sterling Pharma Solutions
Donna Anderson
Karen Gallon
Ian Lisle

Vacancy: QC Lab Technician

Location: Deeside, North Wales (near Chester, Manchester & Liverpool)

As the QC Lab Technician you will have a passion for science and have an enthusiastic approach and interest in the development of bioanalytical methods. This role is crucial to the efficient functioning of the laboratory and will be part of a team that develop, qualify and test a range of biological molecules, such as therapeutic proteins, monoclonal antibodies and Antibody Drug Conjugate (ADC’s).

This is an entry level role and there would be an exceptional development opportunity to progress for the right candidate.

We are a fast-growing global pharmaceutical CDMO (Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation), with more than 50 years’ experience in developing and manufacturing Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs). We are a proven and trusted partner to some of the world’s most innovative biotechs and leading pharmaceutical companies and are widely recognised for our expertise in complex and hazardous chemistry.

Please click on the link to find out more...
https://lnkd.in/egyFkfAW
Joanne Bond
Stewart Mitchell
Nigel Smith
Natalie Stanley-Smith
Sterling Pharma Solutions

Vacancy: Marketing Manager (Maternity Cover)

Location: Cramlington, Northumberland (Hybrid - 1 day per week onsite)

As the Marketing Manager you will work as part of our global marketing team reporting directly to the Marketing Director where the main purpose of your role will be to deliver consistent, strategic and effective marketing across the globe.

We are looking for someone highly organised and creative with good analytical skills that is passionate about marketing and can work in a fast-paced environment. We are a fast growing, dynamic business and this is a great opportunity to gain experience in an omni-channel, global marketing environment.

We are a fast-growing global pharmaceutical CDMO (Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation), with more than 50 years’ experience in developing and manufacturing Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs). We are a proven and trusted partner to some of the world’s most innovative biotechs and leading pharmaceutical companies and are widely recognised for our expertise in complex and hazardous chemistry.

Please click on the link to find out more....
https://lnkd.in/eeSS-anz
Sterling Pharma Solutions
Emma Greenwood (FCIM)
Emily Brown ACIM

Vacancy: VP Global Procurement (Remote)

As the Vice President of Global Procurement, you will report directly to the Chief Operating Officer where you will be responsible for developing a robust and innovative global strategy in the CDMO API supply chain space, in existing geographies while working collaboratively with business leaders.

Sterling are a fast-growing global pharmaceutical CDMO (Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation), with more than 50 years’ experience in developing and manufacturing Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs). We are a proven and trusted partner to some of the world’s most innovative biotechs and leading pharmaceutical companies and are widely recognised for our expertise in complex and hazardous chemistry.

We are a dynamic business, employing more than 1300 talented and passionate people in the UK, US and Europe who together support our customers in bringing new medicines to market, improving and saving the lives of patients. We support our customers through the full product lifecycle from pre-clinical development right up to full scale commercial manufacturing and today we are proud to have built a culture of excellence in science and unrivalled service.

Please click on the link to find out more....
https://lnkd.in/eejkmKfq
Sterling Pharma Solutions
Andrew Henderson

Vacancy: Global Senior Network Engineer

Location: Cramlington, Northumberland

As the Senior Network Engineer, you will report directly to the IT Infrastructure Manager, working as part of our Global Digital Services team where you will be responsible for ensuring a smooth operation of the Group Data LAN/WAN infrastructure in a fast-paced environment, with the goal of achieving maximum availability of all voice and data networks across the business.

We are a fast-growing global pharmaceutical CDMO (Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation), with more than 50 years’ experience in developing and manufacturing Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs). We are a proven and trusted partner to some of the world’s most innovative biotechs and leading pharmaceutical companies and are widely recognised for our expertise in complex and hazardous chemistry.

Vacancy: QC Analytical Scientist

Location: Deeside, North Wales (near Chester, Manchester & Liverpool)

As the QC Analytical Scientist, you will report directly to the QC Manager where you will be responsible for the sampling and testing of raw materials for manufacture using pharmacopeial tests and qualification of bio-analytical methods and subsequent testing of materials for release and stability studies. As part of the QC team, you will also be responsible for ensuring an efficient, compliant, and safe laboratory is maintained at all times ensuring timelines and quality are met for all testing.

We are a fast-growing global pharmaceutical CDMO (Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation), with more than 50 years’ experience in developing and manufacturing Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs). We are a proven and trusted partner to some of the world’s most innovative biotechs and leading pharmaceutical companies and are widely recognised for our expertise in complex and hazardous chemistry.

As the Process Safety Manager you will be responsible for the successful implementation and maintenance of the process safety (including major accident hazards) management (PSM) system, and to provide technical input and leadership in all aspects of plant and process safety.

We are a fast-growing global pharmaceutical CDMO (Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation), with more than 50 years’ experience in developing and manufacturing Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs). We are a proven and trusted partner to some of the world’s most innovative biotechs and leading pharmaceutical companies and are widely recognised for our expertise in complex and hazardous chemistry.

As the Environmental & Sustainability Manager you will be responsible for the successful implementation and maintenance of the environmental management system (EMS), and providing technical input and leadership in all aspects of impact assessment, energy management, sustainability and Corporate Social Responsibility objectives.

Delighted to be back again at Newcastle University for the Chemistry & Alumni Research Synposium. Thank you to my colleagues for supporting Kin Lok Ho and Oliver Gray.

Thank you again Newcastle University for hosting another great event, Careers outside the Lab where we got to talk to some fantastic students looking for opportunities in industry.
Sterling Pharma Solutions

Well done Sterling what a great achievement!

ingestedContentSummary.title: Sterling wins Company of the Year at the Bionow annual awards - Sterling Pharma Solutions

message.text:
We are delighted to have been awarded Company of the Year at the annual Bionow awards! 

The judges were impressed with our ongoing investment into our facilities and capabilities, as well as our significant contribution to the local economies around our sites. 

Thank you to the judges and also the award sponsor, AstraZeneca.

Click below to find out more 👇🏼 

Bionow #BionowAwards #WeAreSterling
